/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11    CMakeFiles/a.out.dir/run.cpp.o  -o a.out -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.2.4.10 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.2.4.10 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so.2.4.10 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.2.4.10 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_contrib.so.2.4.10 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.2.4.10 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.2.4.10 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_gpu.so.2.4.10 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.2.4.10 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.4.10 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.2.4.10 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_legacy.so.2.4.10
